ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM List Group Members
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM List Group Members
ActivityMetadata.Description:
List the members of a [group](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/204519819-Group-Management-) under your account.
**Prerequisite**: Pro, Business, or Education account **Scopes**: `group:read:admin`
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

List Group Members

List the members of a [group](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/204519819-Group-Management-) under your account. **Prerequisite**: Pro, Business, or Education account **Scopes**: `group:read:admin`

Method: Get

OperationID: groupMembers

EndPoint:

/groups/{groupId}/members
